name: Asteroids MK II
description:
Your ship is the only safe haven in the eternal void of space, and the sound of your breath your only way of knowing you still live. Don't let the approaching asteroids take away either of those.

Created by Matias Karplus, using Raylib 3.7, C++ and Visual Studio 2019.

All visuals assets and design by Matias Karplus.

External sounds:

  • Silence sound effect by poul bautist

Youtube video

  • NedadSimic - Muffled explosion
